menu.name: Take N Bake Pizza 14"
menu.description: We par bake the crust, add toppings, and you cook the pizza in your own oven at 425 degrees for 15-25 minutes, depending on the oven. We make these at the time you order them. You choose your toppings.

menu.name: Dough Balls 14"
menu.description: Our hand-rolled, hand-made dough balls ready to be pressed into your own pie. Great for those with their own pizza ovens. Order a six pack and freeze what you need for the future.

menu.name: Pizza Home Kit 14"
menu.description: We provide you with a doughball, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese and corn meal for you to make your own pizza. When you get it home, spread the corn meal across the surface; stretch your dough out, apply the sauce and mozzarella cheese to the surface and then pop in the oven at 450 degrees for 15-25 minutes. You can order additional toppings if needed.
